item.title: Stop Using substr(): The Deprecated JavaScript API and the Right Replacements (slice vs substring)
item.description: substr() is deprecated and risky to rely on. This guide explains why, contrasts it with slice() and substring(), and provides a clear migration checklist and best practices.
